content.rendered: Fun filled Addictive Bricks breaker Game, “Brick Breaker Endless” is out with excitement and fun. This Challenging Breaking neon bricks with firing balls will blow out your stress. Break as many bricks as possible and achieve high score. Shoot the Bricks in proper angle to break more bricks and target power-ups to gain better scores.Features:- Endless Gameplay- Free to play- Neon colored tiles- Special Power Ups
